tv.programme: 溏心風暴3#27[粵] 順華向黃家人匯報沈沝報仇原因,麗熒、永正各自說出往事,永正否認曾與沈沝交往。沈沝在許旺股東會上當眾指摘黃家人格有問題,還播放梁贊嘲諷許家的錄音,使貝兒也贊成分拆公司。麗熒、永正與沈沝當面對質,沈沝指出永正曾與她郊遊兼在 -->月老廟前定誓盟;麗熒、永正到廟查證,竟找到永正與沈沝合起捐瓦紀錄,麗熒氣憤。一張合照讓永正想起往事,麗熒認為失聯的跳舞蘭可解開謎團……「四朵金花」重聚,永正整合資料要求沈沝說出真相。 -->

tv.programme: 東張西望[粵] 《東張西望》星期一至日,緊貼追蹤社會大事、趣聞逸事,並報道娛樂圈最新動態、藝人消息,以及劇集宣傳和花絮。「今日突發」環節為大家追蹤即日熱門新聞;專題環節,深入探討大眾關心的時事、社會及民生問題,並訪問相關的專家。 --> 《東張西望》星期一至日,緊貼追蹤社會大事、趣聞逸事,並報道娛樂圈最新動態、藝人消息,以及劇集宣傳和花絮。「今日突發」環節為大家追蹤即日熱門新聞;專題環節,深入探討大眾關心的時事、社會及民生問題,並訪問相關的專家。 -->

愛.回家之開心速遞#1750[粵] 熊樹根是小型運輸公司東主,為人慳儉,與次女若水、三女心如,以及長女的兒子金城安同住舊樓,惟心如與若水經常為瑣碎事爭吵不休,教樹根哭笑不得。樹根無視眾人反對,力邀不修邊幅的親弟樹仁搬來同住,怎料樹仁竟無意間招 -->惹了因交通意外身亡的鬼魂龍璟風,令熊家出現翻天覆地的轉變!與此同時,若水在百貨公司工作多年,以為可如願獲晉升,卻見高栢菲空降成為其上司,戰火一觸即發;而栢菲原來更與樹仁有段耐人尋味的往事…… -->

下流上車族#3[粵] 香港買樓「上車」的難度可謂世界之冠。2008年金融海嘯,超市經理車志明慌忙賣樓,誰知狂追樓價十四年也未能再上車,中產慘變「中慘」。妻子雯慧憶樓成狂,到豪宅當鐘點女傭,拍照上載社交平台,令表妹覺得自己還在住豪宅;小女兒露宿 -->街頭,博取提早分配公屋的機會;大女兒更以假結婚手段去抽居屋…最後志明把心一橫,竟認母親的情敵作母,想騙取這老小三的公屋單位。車家用盡下流手段為圓上車夢,鬧得笑料百出,嚐盡親情衝突,感情激變,幸最後醒悟「屋」不等於「家」,一家人終放棄追「屋」夢,同願以愛為家。 -->

美麗戰場#13[粵] 鍾家寶、林小美、李靜兒三個姊妹情深,畢業後因不同緣故而逐漸各散東西。家寶被小美私下提名參加雜誌的校花選舉,最終脫穎而出後獲金牌經理人王一言招攬;一言鼓勵家寶參選香港小姐,但遭同屆佳麗兼繼妹鍾家琪惡意陷害……家寶及後成功踏 -->進娛樂圈這個「戰場」,並結識到富豪之子龐振宇。二人共諧連理後,家寶躋身另一個豪門「戰場」,更與兩位姊妹漸行漸遠,讓她們彼此走遠的,究竟是妒忌、尊嚴、財勢,還是其他? -->

傳承‧狂歡55:答得快 好世界[粵] 為慶祝TVB踏入55周年,台慶綜藝《答得快 好世界》,讓全港觀眾重溫不同年代的經典問答遊戲節目,各集精選歷來最受歡迎的答題比拼,邀來一眾星級藝人嘉賓,齊齊玩多一次,爭做終極大贏家!十二隊藝人展開連場激鬥, -->經過六集初賽與兩集準決賽,解答香港、世界各地時事、生活常識、歷史、藝術、旅遊等全方位難題,最終脫穎而出的兩支隊伍,會晉身決賽大戰,競逐電視界問答王者的寶座! -->

傳承‧狂歡55:霎時再感動[粵] 及 環球新聞檔案[粵] 在香港這個生活節奏急促的都市,許多人每天都為口奔馳,過着營營役役的日子。為滿足生活需要而打拼的同時,大家或會忽略了內心的感受。每逢夜闌人靜,你可有記起自己對上一次從心靈獲得快樂是甚麼時 -->候?《霎時再感動》邀來不同藝人,以獨白形式為觀眾帶來饒富寓意或是發人深省的小故事,並分享從中所得的啟發和感受。節目希望透過一個個勵志的小故事溫暖人心,發放更多正能量。 -->
晚間新聞[粵] 報道本地、兩岸、國際重要新聞以及體育消息,讓你洞悉各地大事及體壇動向。 --> 報道本地、兩岸、國際重要新聞以及體育消息,讓你洞悉各地大事及體壇動向。 -->

香港新活力[粵] 及 新聞檔案[粵] 香港開埠至今180多年,目前尚有多少歷史建築物?政府又如何保育它們?香港居民預期壽命全球最長,本地醫療衞生總開支近年不斷上升,如何發展智慧醫療去應付需求?從文化藝術、科技工程、學術研究、醫療衛生、金融建築 -->等範疇,闡述香港各行各業如何善用國家優勢和國際視野,在過去25年積極推動創新,並發揮靈活多變的精神,引領香港繼續向前邁進。《香港新活力》,為觀眾作出詳細介紹。 -->

傳承·經典55:成吉思汗#6[粵][PG] 鐵木真得塔塔統指點領悟到軍事知識,殲減泰亦赤族,鐵木真留合答安在乞顏族居住。別里藉詞收取貢品,以探虛實,鐵木真忍痛將大部份牲畜財物送予他,並故意掩蓋實力,暗下戒備。桑昆向合答安提出婚事,合答安堅拒。 --> 鐵木真得塔塔統指點領悟到軍事知識,殲減泰亦赤族,鐵木真留合答安在乞顏族居住。別里藉詞收取貢品,以探虛實,鐵木真忍痛將大部份牲畜財物送予他,並故意掩蓋實力,暗下戒備。桑昆向合答安提出婚事,合答安堅拒。 -->

無間音樂[粵] 節目送上本地及外地最新、最熱門的MV。星期一至五深夜各有主題,「勁歌金榜速遞」搜羅「勁歌金榜」十大位置MV;「GLOBAL HOT PICKS」播放英、美、日、韓等地外語流行曲MV;「超級勁歌推介」播放本星期「推介」及「挑戰歌 -->」;「華語熱選」送上熱播華語金曲;「精選重溫」有昔日好歌連環放送。 -->

溏心風暴3#28[粵] 事情水落石出,但麗熒不滿永正對家人事不上心。沈沝離開香港,圍家為她奔波,服侍周到,沈沝大感窩心。許家約黃家聚會,打算搞好關係再談分拆,怎料秀慧背後數臭圍家為人,令麗熒大怒反擊。此事令黃家人好奇圍家是否對貝兒有意,亦讓許 -->家更想盡快實行分拆。雅麟單獨約會永正,提出分拆事宜,永正理解但仍覺心痛。商討分拆會議上,麗熒責許家背信棄義,不會輕易答應分拆。貝兒、圍家對分拆事感無奈,只想專注處理義工隊事務。 -->

紅葉瀛風[粵] 三位主持來到十和田湖風景區,當中楓葉樹林由青綠、微黃、嫣紅至火紅,層層疊疊。三人分別從懸崖觀景台及船上,感受水中七彩紅葉森林和被紅葉擁抱的美景。在青森,日夜都可以觀賞紅葉,思琦、大隻仔和Ria晚上來到中野紅葉山的楓樹林,在夜色 -->之中飽覽一樹嫣紅。青森盛產蘋果眾所周知,不過,青森蘋果有紅色、綠色、黃色等多達40餘種,有不少更是絕不外銷,三人四處搜羅各式蘋果產品,像飲品、果醬、小食等等。並造訪津輕別具東北民間色彩的Kokeshi木娃娃製作坊,親手試造自家作品。 -->

紅葉瀛風[粵] 離開青森,來到著名的魚米之鄉山形縣,楊思琦、溫家偉及湯寶珍繼續追蹤日本東北的紅葉秋色。稻米是日本人的主要食糧,三人來到當地有名的糧倉,看見稻田一片金黃,決定體驗一天農耕生活,生活於大都市的他們能否捱得住農家的勞碌?三人往最上川 -->,欣賞集齊紅、橙、黃、綠,色彩悅目的茂密樹林。更登臨隱匿深山的千年古剎若松寺參拜,拜神儀式變成了當地「潮人」新興玩意「Power Spot」,到底是怎麼回事? -->

毛毛故事時間[英] 誰不想擁著友善的毛毛朋友聽故事?兩隻小老鼠Nina和Leon最幸運, 有Yetily每天讀故事書給他們聽。毛公仔Yetily是一間書店的吉祥物, 書店關門後, 他就跟一班期待聽他說故事的朋友們相聚。 -->Who has never dreamt of cuddling up with a friendly Yeti for a wonderful story? When the shop is closed, he comes to life to join his friends, who would never miss their story for anything in the world! -->

迷你波莉[英] 別人常說波莉年紀少, 不能做想做的事, 但她證明了每個孩子都知道的事實:「小」可以是最「大」的力量。波莉得到了讓她縮小至四吋的魔法鎖, 善用小小力量, 發現縮小後能經歷大冒險, 為自己及好朋友帶來大改變。 -->Polly is often told she is TOO LITTLE to do the things she wants to do. But Polly proves what every kid knowsthat being little isnt a limitation, ITS HER GREATEST STRENGTH. When Polly Pocket inherits a magic locket that allows her to shrink to 4 tall, she embraces her pocket-sized powers and finds the upside of shrinking is BIG ADVENTURES and making a BIG DIFFERENCE for her & her best friends. -->

無窮之路 II - 無價之保[英] 內蒙古｢庫布其沙漠｣被稱為｢死亡之海｣,當地風沙肆虐,連附近的市鎮都隨時有被沙塵暴淹沒的可能。荒漠化是一個世界難題,氣候變暖,地球上佔地36億公頃的沙漠正以驚人的速度擴張,威脅人類的生存。內蒙古開創了一套獨 -->Kubuqi Desert was once covered with lush grass. Excessive cultivation, grass burning and grazing has led to desertification. The 3.6 billion hectare desert is expanding at an alarming rate. Inner Mongolia -->特的治理沙漠模式,令｢死亡之海｣最終變成綠州,更成為目前世上唯一一個被整體治理成功的沙漠。 has to resort to a unique way to cure the desert, turning the Sea Of Death into an oasis. -->

非凡酒店[英] 今集介紹奧地利蒂羅爾的圓頂溫泉酒店和馬斯特里赫特的克魯舍倫酒店。兩間歐洲酒店位於兩個截然不同的環境,都把悠久綿長的歷史,融入了現代建築和設計,向客人提供難能可貴的體驗。 -->Located in two very different landscapes are two unique European hotels, which combine their ancient heritage with modern architecture and design to deliver a one of a kind experience. How does water alone support a five star spa experience in the 21st century? What can a converted monastery do to stand out from the crowd? Visit the Aquadome in the Austrian Tyrol and the Kruisherenhotel in Maastricht and find out. -->

新晉廚神下廚易[英] 我們下班回家,有時累得不想下廚,有時想下廚卻不知道該弄甚麼,因此,新晉廚神在今集在介紹好幾個簡易便捷食譜,以尋常的食材,只需要好幾分鐘,便能夠烹煮出適合平日晚上享用的美食。 -->We can all be accused of coming in from work and just being too tired to get into the kitchen to cook up a meal for ourselves, sometimes its hard to even think what you should cook, so in this episode Donal will show viewers some really quick and easy recipes which can be created in a matter of minutes any night of the week, using common ingredients. -->

醫者仁心#12[英][PG] 馮醫生舉報一名資深外科醫生,認為他無能力繼續做手術。最後馮和民生說服他以顧問身份繼續工作。查醫生和潘醫生產生矛盾,因為潘在承認濫藥後仍繼續行醫。而兩人要合作醫治一班有相似症狀的葡萄園工人。 -->Dr. Frome reports a veteran surgeon at New Amsterdam who he believes is no longer capable of performing surgery. He and Max end up having him stay on in a consulting role. Dr. Sharpe struggles with Dr. Bloom, who is still practicing even after admitting to abusing Adderall. They work on treating a group of vineyard workers that come in with similar symptoms. -->

我要做廚神 : 澳洲篇[英] 今季第一次豁免賽開始,有五人贏得參賽資格。比賽分成兩個回合,第一回合是味覺考驗,得分最高的人最快進入第二回合,有75分鐘烹調時間。其他人則根據得分,在較短時間內完成任務。 -->The race for the season's only immunity spot is on. Five contestants become the focus when they try to make themselves safe from the next elimination. Round 1 is a MasterChef classic, a taste test. The contestant who wins this test gets the highest amount of time, which is 75 minutes, in Round 2, while the other four will get less time to finish their cooking according to their test scores. -->

創新國度[英] 機械人地產經紀會邊走邊推銷房子。振動腕帶會幫助代聽覺受損的人聽到聲音。3D打印機會創造可移植到人眼中的人工角膜以幫助修復眼睛。航空交通管制員像空中的交通警察以確保不會發生空中交通意外。 -->Robot Realtors will roam to sell you a home. A vibrating wristband will help the hearing impaired understand sounds. A 3D printing devise will create artificial corneas that can be transplanted into the human eye to help fix your eyes. Air traffic controllers are like traffic cops in the sky to make sure no one is hitting anything else. -->

恩雨之聲[普/粵] 恩雨之聲製作係搜羅世界各地華人之真實見證,每一集都係一個真人真事激勵人心的影音節目,在香港及全球50多個國家城市播放,向觀眾傳遞信、望、愛的信息。 -->Showers of Blessing productions search for real testimonies from Chinese people around the world. Every episode is an authentic, touching story with real characters and events, and is broadcast in Hong Kong and over 50 other countries and cities, delivering a message of faith, hope, and love to viewers. -->

花生動畫[英/粵] 故事以查理布朗、史諾比及胡士托為主角,講述他們日常生活及校園趣事。 -->A brand new TV series that recapture the spirit and the dynamic of the universal and timeless stories of Charlie Browns gang and the wildly imaginative, supremely confident and world-famous beagle: Snoopy! --> 故事以查理布朗、史諾比及胡士托為主角,講述他們日常生活及校園趣事。 A brand new TV series that recapture the spirit and the dynamic of the universal and timeless stories of Charlie Browns gang and the wildly imaginative, supremely confident and world-famous beagle: Snoopy! -->

毛毛故事時間[英] 誰不想擁著友善的毛毛朋友聽故事?兩隻小老鼠Nina和Leon最幸運, 有Yetily每天讀故事書給他們聽。毛公仔Yetily是一間書店的吉祥物, 書店關門後, 他就跟一班期待聽他說故事的朋友們相聚。 -->Who has never dreamt of cuddling up with a friendly Yeti for a wonderful story? Nina and Leon, two little mice, are lucky indeed! Every day Yetily reads them a new book. Yetily is a giant plush toy and mascot of the local bookshop. When the shop is closed, he comes to life to join his friends, who would never miss their story for anything in the world! -->

開心娜娜和月亮寶寶[英] 《開心娜娜和月亮寶寶》是給學前兒童的一系列50個經典故事。透過讓人感到溫暖安心的旁白,描寫玩具屋內多個玩具角色一家人的緊密關係,及他們跟來自月亮的奇妙訪客的歷險旅程,從而提倡核心價值。 -->Moon and Me is a classic series of 50 gentle stories for preschool. It is designed to promote core values through an appealing narrative of warmth and security, portraying a tightly bonded family of comical toy characters living in a Toy House, and the adventures they all share with a magical visitor from the Moon. -->

C姐C弟[英] 這一家的兄弟姊妹每次都在互相幫助下, 解決小紛爭和在日常生活中會遇到的各種問題, 用的都是小朋友最擅長的方法, 就是扮廚師、演員、太空人、偵探… -->In each episode Cleo & Cuquin, with help from their siblings, will face small conflicts and everyday problems, dealing with them the best way children know how to: playing at being cooks, actors, astronauts, detectives --> 這一家的兄弟姊妹每次都在互相幫助下, 解決小紛爭和在日常生活中會遇到的各種問題, 用的都是小朋友最擅長的方法, 就是扮廚師、演員、太空人、偵探… In each episode Cleo & Cuquin, with help from their siblings, will face small conflicts and everyday problems, dealing with them the best way children know how to: playing at being cooks, actors, astronauts, detectives -->

全美一叮[英] 咯滾樂樂隊為第二輪面試打響頭炮。今集有各種精彩綜藝表演。放克幾何以熱舞帶動全場氣氛。鄉村音樂歌手正克跟樂隊帶來一首原創歌。諧星愛子分享入籍心情。誰得到賀維的黃金一叮?萬勿錯過。 -->AGT's second round of audition kicks off with The Bock and Roll Band, featuring chicken musicians. It's a night of variety entertainment. Funkanometry brings high energy to the stage. Country singer Drake and his band wow the judges with an original song. Comedian Aiko shares with us her transformation after getting citizenship. And who gets the Golden Buzzer from Howie? Stay tune. -->

東瀛入廚易[英] 像真正大師一樣炮製日本菜!由傳統經典到煮家常菜的秘訣, 學習做壽司、天婦羅和御好燒的藝術, 還會介紹由北海道到沖繩的地方菜, 認識不同場合的完美食譜, 《東瀛入廚易》就是一本完整的菜單。 -->Learn how to prepare Japanese food like a true master! From traditional classics, to the secrets of home-cooking, learn the art of sushi making, tempura frying and Okonomiyaki-style grilling. Plus, sample regional dishes from Hokkaido to Okinawa to discover the perfect recipe for every occasion. 101 Easy Japanese offers a complete menu. -->

明珠930:變形金剛:黑月降臨[英/粵][PG] 今集博、狂兩派將戰線推向宇宙,由地球打到上月球!上世紀六十年代的太空競賽,原來另有秘密---狂派又再作惡,這場關乎人類生死存亡的終極大戰,柯柏文等博派戰士能否穩守最後防線? -->A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the TRANSFORMERS alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky (Shia LaBeouf) and the AUTOBOTS must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the DECEPTICONS all-consuming evil in the smash hit from director Michael Bay and executive producer Steven Spielberg. -->

Patisserie chef Eloise Durrant's new commission is to make a Canadian tepee cake for a bi-cultural wedding celebration. Meanwhile, ex-helicopter pilot, Rosie Dummer, creats an edible, dress-whirling dancing Indian girl for a charity event. -->

世界動物之最[英] 草原是大自然的大舞台讓大型動物演出精彩生活供大家觀賞。今集會介紹各種標誌性動物:非洲草原的獅子、豹、象、犀牛、獵豹和黑斑羚。澳洲的袋鼠、沙袋鼠和奇趣的長鼻袋狸。另外還有美洲野牛和狼。 -->Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people. From the iconic African grasslands the series showcases lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs and impalas. Australian kangaroos, wallaby and the wonderfully odd potoroo join American bison and wolves in a grand tour of iconic animals. -->

親親這一家[英] 本節目榮獲BAFTA最佳紀錄片獎, 以精彩的影片紀錄英國家庭的生活點滴, 看著一群三至七歲的小孩子成長, 追蹤一家人的日常生活。他們的故事有趣且富啟發性, 有時令人傷感, 從小孩子的角度, 訴說家庭生活的故事。 -->Our Family is a BAFTA award winning documentary series with integral digital content that celebrates the everyday magic of family life in the UK for 3-7 year olds. The Cat in the Hat knows a lot but he doesnt know everything, making him the perfect guide to learning and fun. -->

我的外星朋友[英] 無憂無慮、開朗活潑、精力充沛的小女孩住在一個熱帶島上, 跟笨手笨腳的外星朋友有很多精彩的經歷, 這對好朋友經常犯下大大小小的錯誤, 小意外有時更會演變成大災難, 幸好每次都有愉快的結局。 -->The lively adventures of a little girl, the carefree, joyful and occasionally perky Fatou, and an alien, the clumsy Roger, on a tropical island Throughout their adventures, they trigger small accidents that sometimes grow into major disasters, but almost always end on a happy note. In short, Roger and Fatou spend their time saving the island from their own mistakes and blunders. -->

搗蛋小女巫[英] Mildred活在女孩子都想要的夢中, 可以學變魔術!每天坐掃帚飛行, 調製魔法藥水和施法術!但她的地位經常受威脅, 除了Hardbroom小姐想把她趕走, 免得她影響校譽之外, 還有Ethel處處針對她, 不想被她搶風頭。 -->Mildred is living every girls dream shes learning how to do real magic! Every day, she gets to fly on a broomstick, mix potions and cast spells. But Mildreds place in this world is constantly in jeopardy. Miss Hardbroom wants her out before she ruins the reputation of Cackles Academy forever. And resident mean girl Ethel Hallow wants Mildred out of the way to stop her from stealing the limelight once and for all. -->

tv.programme: 無窮之路 II - 無價之保[英] 國家成功脫貧,但經濟增長的代價往往是環境污染、生態原貌惡化等。近年,國家宣布全力推進生態文明建設,堅持人與自然和諧共生。《無窮之路》製作團隊再次踏上征途,由最北走到最南,深入極地無人區、沙漠、海底,又見證政 -->府如何保護藏羚羊、野生象、新疆雪豹、長江魚類等;帶觀眾探索中國的生態重建之路。在污染治理及保護生物多樣性等方面,全國上下付出了多少努力,去捍衛大自然賦予人類的綠水青山,這樣的「無價之寶」? -->

全美一叮[英] 融和日本的精彩舞蹈繼續帶動第二輪面試的氣氛。今集盡展力的表現;馬雲的腹肌懂得拍掌,維維安娜獻上充滿力量的空中雜技,鋼奴的鐵鈎功技驚四座。西蒙竟公然表示愛上參賽者,那到底是誰? -->The second round of audition continues with Fusion Japan's spectacular dance performance. Marvin shows off his pecks and abs, while Viviana dazzles us with her grace and strength. JoJo performs a stellar rendition with his niece Bri. Zeno wows us sticking a hook through his nose and pulls Sofia and Heidi. And Simon falls in love with a contestant. Who would that be? -->

東瀛入廚易[英] 像真正大師一樣炮製日本菜!由傳統經典到煮家常菜的秘訣, 學習做壽司、天婦羅和御好燒的藝術, 還會介紹由北海道到沖繩的地方菜, 認識不同場合的完美食譜, 《東瀛入廚易》就是一本完整的菜單。 -->Learn how to prepare Japanese food like a true master! From traditional classics, to the secrets of home-cooking, learn the art of sushi making, tempura frying and Okonomiyaki-style grilling. Plus, sample regional dishes from Hokkaido to Okinawa to discover the perfect recipe for every occasion. 101 Easy Japanese offers a complete menu. -->

芝麻街[英] 逾45年來,美國各地家庭,一直冀望廣受愛戴的芝麻街布偶,會助子女成長得更聰明、堅強和善良。藉芝麻街和其他節目內容,子女學會ABC等英文字母、建立毅力和培養道德觀念,並且持久愛學習。 -->For more than 45 years, families across America have looked to Sesame Street's beloved Muppets to help children grow smarter, stronger and kinder. Through the program and other Sesame content, children have learned their ABCs, built their inner strength, and developed their moral compass along with a lasting love of learning. -->

毛毛故事時間[英] 誰不想擁著友善的毛毛朋友聽故事?兩隻小老鼠Nina和Leon最幸運, 有Yetily每天讀故事書給他們聽。毛公仔Yetily是一間書店的吉祥物, 書店關門後, 他就跟一班期待聽他說故事的朋友們相聚。 -->Who has never dreamt of cuddling up with a friendly Yeti for a wonderful story? Nina and Leon, two little mice, are lucky indeed! Every day Yetily reads them a new book. Yetily is a giant plush toy and mascot of the local bookshop. When the shop is closed, he comes to life to join his friends, who would never miss their story for anything in the world! -->

迷你波莉[英] 別人常說波莉年紀少, 不能做想做的事, 但她證明了每個孩子都知道的事實:「小」可以是最「大」的力量。波莉得到了讓她縮小至四吋的魔法鎖, 善用小小力量, 發現縮小後能經歷大冒險, 為自己及好朋友帶來大改變。 -->Polly is often told she is TOO LITTLE to do the things she wants to do. But Polly proves what every kid knowsthat being little isnt a limitation, ITS HER GREATEST STRENGTH. When Polly Pocket inherits a magic locket that allows her to shrink to 4 tall, she embraces her pocket-sized powers and finds the upside of shrinking is BIG ADVENTURES and making a BIG DIFFERENCE for her & her best friends. -->

時空大冒險[英] 想尋找刺激嗎?來跟Justin和他的幻想朋友們踏上精彩的旅程, 走遍全世界的每一個角落!Justin用幻想投入逼真的經歷, 回到歷史的不同時刻。跟他們上路去, 體會珍貴的快樂、友誼和奇遇! -->Looking for adventure? Then come along as Justin and his imaginary pals Olive and Squidgy star in the biggest stories of all time, told from every corner of the world! Justins imagination catapults him into larger-than-life adventures set in different points in history. Join Justin, Olive and Squidgy in these exhilarating stories to experience how fun, friendship, adventure are timeless! -->

Segments will consist of current affairs focus subjects related to business, finance and the economy, US-China Trade relations, as well as the latest investment research, economic and development trends in HK, Greater Bay Area. -->

穹蒼下的世界: 南西班牙[英/粵] 我們要去一個曾有世上最大城巿的地方,那裡的迷人海岸線革新了現代旅遊業,且橄欖油產量冠絕全球。我們從佈滿樹林的山區,走到繽紛的田野,再到延綿幾英里的沙灘,探索南西班牙的歷史和文化。 -->We will visit a place thought to have had the largest city in the world, which has a magnificent coastline that transformed modern tourism, and produces more olive oil than any other country.With its dramatic landscape varies from forested mountains to a tapestry of rich farmland and miles of sandy beaches, Southern Spain has much to offer. So it's no surprise that millions of holidaymakers visit every year. -->

台慶鉅獻:失落的符號#101[英][PG] 哈佛符號學教授羅拔蘭頓應邀到華府演講。他甫到埗不久,國會山莊內便出現一隻斷掌!蘭頓認出它屬恩師彼得所羅門所有,而彼得已遭人綁架。為了救恩師出生天,羅拔開始走進古代隱秘和古代智慧的神秘世界。 -->Robert Langdon, a Harvard semioticist, is invited to give a lecture in Washington DC. Within minutes of his arrival, a human hand appears in the Capitol and Langdon recognizes that it is the hand of his mentor Peter Solomon, who had been kidnapped. If Langdon wants to rescue his mentor, he has to accept the mysterious invitation into the world of ancient myths and wisdoms. -->

台慶鉅獻:失落的符號#102[英][PG] 蘭頓答允摩洛要求,替他尋找「古老智慧」。蘭頓與彼得之女嘉芙蓮以及共濟會成員華倫,要先解開一段隱藏在希伯來文聖經中的密碼。然而,他們發現面紗背後還有面紗!秘而不宣的中情局從中作梗,阻止蘭頓營救彼得。 -->Desperate to save Peter, Langdon, together with Peter's daughter Katherine and Freemason memeber Warran Bellamy, tries to decode a doctored Hebrew religious text which hides the secret of the ancient knowledge that Mal'akh instructs Langdon to find in order to free Peter, but only to found out that "One veil lifts to reveal another". Meanwhile, the CIA tries to stop Langdon to do so, with it's own secret agenda hiding in the shadows. -->

明珠絕色:野性四季[英/粵] 春天對溫帶地區的動植物帶來最大影響。這是更新、重生和復興之時。土撥鼠從冬眠醒來,帝王斑蝶準備遷徒。黑嘴松雞和西鸊鷉展開交配季節。加拿大雁和棕脅秋沙鴨還得趕緊教幼小游水和飛行。 -->Spring is the season with the greatest influence on the inhabitants of temperate latitudes. It is a time for renewal, rebirth, and resurgence. Marmots emerge from hibernation, and monarch butterflies migrate to the north. Chamois take advantage of spring's opportunities. Black-billed capercaillies and western grebes begin their mating season. Canada goose and hooded mergansers have to teach their young to swim and fly. -->

明珠930:星空奇遇記 超域時空[英][PG] 內心迷茫的卻克隊長,答允乘坐神秘逃生艙的外星人要求,率領企業號進入前人未至的星雲,執行營救行動。他們被困遙遠行星,新的敵人對企業號以至整個星際聯邦的價值觀構成威脅。這個敵人的身分更是撲溯迷離。 -->Lost and perplexed, Captain Kirk once again leads his team on a rescue mission after a mysterious escape pod drifts out of a nearby nebula. The crew explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where the new enemy puts them and everything the Federation stands for to the test. Stranded on the hostile planet, they face the threat from their own kind. -->
